parameters.name: pn_Subscription
parameters.label: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: pn_Workspace
parameters.label: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({pn_Subscription})
| project id

parameters.name: Apps
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| summarize Count = count() by AppDisplayName
| order by Count desc, AppDisplayName asc
| project Value = AppDisplayName, Label = strcat(AppDisplayName, ' - ', Count, ' sign-ins'), Selected = false

parameters.name: Users
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName
| order by Count desc, UserDisplayName asc
| project Value = UserDisplayName, Label = strcat(UserDisplayName, ' - ', Count, ' sign-ins'), Selected = false

content.query:
let data = SigninLogs
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
|where UserDisplayName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
|extend errorCode = Status.errorCode
|extend SigninStatus = case(errorCode == 0, "Success", errorCode == 50058, "Pending action (Interrupts)",errorCode == 50140, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 51006, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50059, "Pending action (Interrupts)",errorCode == 65001, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 52004, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50055, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50144, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50072, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50074, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 16000, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 16001, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 16003, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50127, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50125, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50129, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 50143, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 81010, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 81014, "Pending action (Interrupts)", errorCode == 81012 ,"Pending action (Interrupts)", "Failure");
data
| summarize Count = count() by SigninStatus
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(SigninStatus:string)['Success', 'Pending action (Interrupts)', 'Failure']) on SigninStatus
| project SigninStatus = iff(SigninStatus == '', SigninStatus1, SigninStatus), Count = iff(SigninStatus == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SigninStatus)
    on SigninStatus
| project-away SigninStatus1, TimeGenerated
| extend Status = SigninStatus
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
        | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
    | extend SigninStatus = 'All Sign-ins', Status = '*'    
)
| order by Count desc

SigninLogs 
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
|where UserDisplayName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend ErrorCode = tostring(Status.errorCode) 
| extend FailureReason = tostring(Status.failureReason) 
| where ErrorCode !in ("0","50058","50148","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012") 
|summarize errCount = count() by ErrorCode, tostring(FailureReason)| sort by errCount
|project ['❌ Error Code'] = ErrorCode, ['Reason']= FailureReason, ['Error Count'] = toint(errCount)
content.title: Summary of top errors

content.query:
SigninLogs 
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
|where UserDisplayName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend ErrorCode = tostring(Status.errorCode) 
| extend FailureReason = tostring(Status.failureReason) 
| where ErrorCode !in ("0","50058","50148","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012") 
| where '{ErrorCode}' == '*' or '{ErrorCode}' == ErrorCode
| top 200 by TimeGenerated desc
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - TimeGenerated
| extend TimeAgo = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')
| project User = UserDisplayName, ['❌ Error Code'] = ErrorCode, ['Sign-in Time'] = TimeAgo, App = AppDisplayName, ['Error code'] = ErrorCode, ['Result type'] = ResultType, ['Result signature'] = ResultSignature, ['Result description'] = ResultDescription, ['Conditional access policies'] = ConditionalAccessPolicies, ['Conditional access status'] = ConditionalAccessStatus, ['Operating system'] = DeviceDetail.operatingSystem, Browser = DeviceDetail.browser, ['Country or region'] = LocationDetails.countryOrRegion, ['State'] = LocationDetails.state, ['City'] = LocationDetails.city, ['Time generated'] = TimeGenerated, Status, ['User principal name'] = UserPrincipalName
content.title: Sign-ins with errors

content.query:
SigninLogs 
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
|where UserDisplayName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend ErrorCode = tostring(Status.errorCode) 
| extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason 
| where ErrorCode in ("50058","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012") 
|summarize errCount = count() by ErrorCode, tostring(FailureReason)
| sort by errCount
|project ['❌ Error Code'] = ErrorCode, ['Reason'] = FailureReason, ['Interrupt Count'] = toint(errCount)
content.title: Summary of sign-ins waiting on user action

content.query:
SigninLogs 
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
|where UserDisplayName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend ErrorCode = tostring(Status.errorCode) 
| extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason 
| where ErrorCode in ("50058","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012") 
| where '{InterruptErrorCode}' == '*' or '{InterruptErrorCode}' == ErrorCode
| top 200 by TimeGenerated desc
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - TimeGenerated
| extend TimeAgo = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')
| project User = UserDisplayName, ['❌ Error Code'] = ErrorCode, ['Sign-in Time'] = TimeAgo, App = AppDisplayName, ['Error code'] = ErrorCode, ['Result type'] = ResultType, ['Result signature'] = ResultSignature, ['Result description'] = ResultDescription, ['Conditional access policies'] = ConditionalAccessPolicies, ['Conditional access status'] = ConditionalAccessStatus, ['Operating system'] = DeviceDetail.operatingSystem, Browser = DeviceDetail.browser, ['Country or region'] = LocationDetails.countryOrRegion, ['State'] = LocationDetails.state, ['City'] = LocationDetails.city, ['Time generated'] = TimeGenerated, Status, ['User principal name'] = UserPrincipalName
content.title: Sign-ins waiting on user action

parameters.name: Apps
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| summarize Count = count() by AppDisplayName
| order by Count desc, AppDisplayName asc
| project Value = AppDisplayName, Label = strcat(AppDisplayName, ' - ', Count, ' sign-ins'), Selected = false

parameters.name: Users
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName
| order by Count desc, UserDisplayName asc
| project Value = UserDisplayName, Label = strcat(UserDisplayName, ' - ', Count, ' sign-ins'), Selected = false

content.query:
let data = SigninLogs
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
|where UserDisplayName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
|extend CAStatus = case(ConditionalAccessStatus =="success","Successful",
                    ConditionalAccessStatus == "failure", "Failed",                                     
                    ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied", "Not applied",                                     
                    isempty(ConditionalAccessStatus), "Not applied", 
                    "Disabled")
|mvexpand ConditionalAccessPolicies
|extend CAGrantControlName = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies.enforcedGrantControls[0])
|extend CAGrantControl = case(CAGrantControlName contains "MFA", "Require MFA", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Terms of Use", "Require Terms of Use", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Privacy", "Require Privacy Statement", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Device", "Require Device Compliant", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Azure AD Joined", "Require Hybird Azure AD Joined Device", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Apps", "Require Approved Apps",
                            "Other");
data
| summarize Count = dcount(Id) by CAStatus
| join kind = inner (data
                    | make-series Trend = dcount(Id) default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by CAStatus
                    ) on CAStatus
| project-away CAStatus1, TimeGenerated
| order by Count desc
content.title: Conditional access status

content.query:
let data = SigninLogs
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
|where UserDisplayName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
|extend errorCode = toint(Status.errorCode)
|extend Reason = tostring(Status.failureReason)
|extend CAStatus = case(ConditionalAccessStatus == "success","✔️ Success",                                     
                        ConditionalAccessStatus == "failure", "❌ Failure",                                     
                        ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied", "⚠️ Not Applied",                                     
                        ConditionalAccessStatus == "", "⚠️ Not Applied", 
                        "🚫 Disabled")
|mvexpand ConditionalAccessPolicies
|extend CAGrantControlName = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies.enforcedGrantControls[0])
|extend CAGrantControl = case(CAGrantControlName contains "MFA", "Require MFA", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Terms of Use", "Require Terms of Use", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Privacy", "Require Privacy Statement", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Device", "Require Device Compliant", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Azure AD Joined", "Require Hybird Azure AD Joined Device", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Apps", "Require Approved Apps","Other");
data
| summarize Count = dcount(Id) by CAStatus, CAGrantControl
| project Id = strcat(CAStatus, '/', CAGrantControl), Name = CAGrantControl, Parent = CAStatus, Count, Type = 'CAGrantControl'
| join kind = inner (data
                    | make-series Trend = dcount(Id) default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by CAStatus, CAGrantControl
                    | project Id = strcat(CAStatus, '/', CAGrantControl), Trend
                    ) on Id
| project-away Id1
| union (data
    | summarize Count = dcount(Id) by CAStatus
    | project Id = CAStatus, Name = CAStatus, Parent = '', Count, Type = 'CAStatus'
    | join kind = inner (data
                        | make-series Trend = dcount(Id) default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by CAStatus
                        | project Id = CAStatus, Trend
                        ) on Id
    | project-away Id1)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Conditional access status

content.query:
let details = dynamic({Detail});
let data = SigninLogs
|where AppDisplayName in ({Apps}) or '*' in ({Apps})
|where UserDisplayName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
|extend errorCode = toint(Status.errorCode)
|extend Reason = tostring(Status.failureReason)
|extend CAStatus = case(ConditionalAccessStatus =="success","✔️ Success",                                     
                        ConditionalAccessStatus == "failure", "❌ Failure",                                     
                        ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied", "⚠️ Not Applied",                                     
                        ConditionalAccessStatus == "", "⚠️ Not Applied", 
                        "🚫 Disabled")
|mvexpand ConditionalAccessPolicies
|extend CAGrantControlName = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies.enforcedGrantControls[0])
|extend CAGrantControl = case(CAGrantControlName contains "MFA", "Require MFA", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Terms of Use", "Require Terms of Use", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Privacy", "Require Privacy Statement", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Device", "Require Device Compliant", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Azure AD Joined", "Require Hybird Azure AD Joined Device", 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Apps", "Require Approved Apps",
                            "Other")
|extend CAGrantControlRank = case(CAGrantControlName contains "MFA", 1, 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Terms of Use", 2, 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Privacy", 3, 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Device", 4, 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Azure AD Joined", 5, 
                            CAGrantControlName contains "Apps", 6,
                            7)
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'CAStatus' and CAStatus == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'CAGrantControl' and CAGrantControl == details.Name and CAStatus == details.Parent);
data
| order by CAGrantControlRank desc
| summarize CAGrantControls = make_set(CAGrantControl) by AppDisplayName, CAStatus, TimeGenerated, UserDisplayName
| extend CAGrantControlText = replace(@",", ", ", replace(@'"', @'', replace(@"\]", @"", replace(@"\[", @"", tostring(CAGrantControls)))))
| extend CAGrantControlSummary = case(array_length(CAGrantControls) > 1, strcat(CAGrantControls[0], ' + ', array_length(CAGrantControls) - 1, ' more'), array_length(CAGrantControls) == 1, tostring(CAGrantControls[0]), 'None')
| top 200 by TimeGenerated desc
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - TimeGenerated
| extend TimeAgo = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')
| project Application = AppDisplayName, ['CA Status'] = CAStatus, ['CA Grant Controls'] = CAGrantControlSummary, ['All CA Grant Controls'] = CAGrantControlText, ['Sign-in Time'] = TimeAgo, ['User'] = UserDisplayName
content.title: Recent sign-ins

content.json:
# Conditional Access Gaps and Recommendations
### Update time range and visit sections to view potential Conditional Access Policy gaps

links.postText: to learn more about Conditional Access best practices

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.label: Time Range
parameters.description: Select a time range for CA insights

content.title: Legacy Authentication -- Learn More

content.json: #### Microsoft recommends blocking sign-ins using legacy authentication

links.postText: to learn more about legacy authentication

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project ClientAppUsed, ResultType, ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ResultType == 0
| extend filterClientApp = case(ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients", "Legacy Authentication", "Modern Authentication")
| summarize count() by UserDisplayName, filterClientApp
| summarize Count = count() by filterClientApp
content.title: Users Signing-In Using Legacy vs. Modern Authentication

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project ClientAppUsed, AppDisplayName, ConditionalAccessPolicies, ResultType, UserDisplayName
| where ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients"
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName
| summarize Count = count() by AppDisplayName
content.title: Users Using Legacy Authentication by Application
content.noDataMessage: No applications allowing legacy authentication sign-ins for the selected time range

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project ClientAppUsed, AppDisplayName, ConditionalAccessPolicies, ResultType, UserDisplayName
| where ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients"
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName, ClientAppUsed
| project-away count_
content.title: Select an application and user to learn more
content.noDataMessage: No application sign-ins using legacy authentication within this time frame

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project UserDisplayName, ClientAppUsed, AppDisplayName, ConditionalAccessPolicies, ResultType, TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, LocationDetails, DeviceDetail
| where ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients"
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ResultType == 0
| where AppDisplayName == "{app}"
| where UserDisplayName == "{user}"
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId
content.title: {user} legacy authentication sign-ins to {app}
Unprotected Applications -- Learn More

content.json:
## Number of Users Signing In to Applications with Conditional Access Policies Not Applied
##### Microsoft recommends that each sign-in to an application has a Conditional Access Policy applied to it.

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project AppDisplayName, ConditionalAccessStatus, Status, ResultType, UserDisplayName
| where ResultType == 0 // sign-in was successful
| where ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied"
| where Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement satisfied by claim in the token" and Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement skipped due to remembered device" // Sign-in was not strong auth
| summarize Count = count() by AppDisplayName, UserDisplayName
| summarize count() by AppDisplayName

SigninLogs
| project AppDisplayName, UserDisplayName, ConditionalAccessStatus, Status, ResultType
| where ResultType == 0 // sign-in was successful
| where ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied"
| where Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement satisfied by claim in the token" and Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement skipped due to remembered device" // Sign-in was not strong auth
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName
| order by Count
content.title: Select an application and user to learn more
content.noDataMessage: No application sign-ins without conditional access coverage in this time frame

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project AppDisplayName, UserDisplayName, ConditionalAccessStatus, Status, ResultType, TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, OperatingSystem = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| where ResultType == 0 // sign-in was successful
| where ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied"
| where AppDisplayName == "{App}"
| where UserDisplayName == "{User}"
| where Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement satisfied by claim in the token" and Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement skipped due to remembered device" // Sign-in was not strong auth
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, OperatingSystem
content.title: {User} sign-ins to {App} without CA coverage
Compromised User Sign-ins -- Learn More

content.json:
## High Risk Sign-In Events Bypassing Conditional Access Policies
##### Microsoft recommends blocking all high risk sign-in events, including sign-ins where the user account is known to be compromised.

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project UserDisplayName, ConditionalAccessStatus, RiskLevelDuringSignIn, Status, ResultType
| where ResultType == 0 // sign-in was successful
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "none" and RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "low" and RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "medium"
| where Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement satisfied by claim in the token" and Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement skipped due to remembered device" // Sign-in was not strong auth
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName, RiskLevelDuringSignIn
| order by Count desc
content.title: Select a user for additional information
content.noDataMessage: No risky sign-ins without CA policies applied in this time frame

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project TimeGenerated, ResultType, RiskLevelDuringSignIn, UserDisplayName, Status, DeviceDetail, LocationDetails, AppDisplayName, CorrelationId
| where ResultType == 0 // sign-in was successful
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "none"
| where UserDisplayName == "{user}"
| where Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement satisfied by claim in the token" and Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement skipped due to remembered device" // Sign-in was not MFA
| extend OperatingSystem = case(tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem) == "", "Unknown", DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| project TimeGenerated, AppDisplayName, CorrelationId, tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion), OperatingSystem
content.title: Risky sign-Ins from {user} with no CA policies
Unprotected Locations -- Learn More

content.json: ## Users With No Conditional Access Coverage by Location

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project UserDisplayName, ConditionalAccessStatus, Status, ResultType, location = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| where ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied"
| where Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement satisfied by claim in the token" and Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement skipped due to remembered device" // Sign-in was not strong auth
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by location, UserDisplayName
| summarize Count = count() by location
| order by Count desc

SigninLogs
| project UserDisplayName, ConditionalAccessStatus, Status, ResultType, LocationDetails
| where ResultType == 0 // sign-in was successful
| where ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied"
| where Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement satisfied by claim in the token" and Status.additionalDetails != "MFA requirement skipped due to remembered device" // Sign-in was not strong auth
| extend Location = case(tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion) == "", "Unknown", LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName, Location
| project-away Count
content.title: Select a country/region to learn more

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project LocationDetails, UserDisplayName, ConditionalAccessStatus, AppDisplayName, ResultType, TimeGenerated, CorrelationId
| where ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied"
| where ResultType == 0 // Sign-in was successful
| extend country = case("{country}" == "Unknown", "", "{country}" != "Unknown", "{country}", "{country}")
| where LocationDetails.countryOrRegion == country
| where UserDisplayName == "{User}"
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, AppDisplayName
content.title: Additional Information

links.preText: Select a conditional access policy to evaluate its impact. To modify or enforce a policy

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.label: Conditional Access Policy
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, CreatedDateTime, ClientAppUsed
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ClientAppUsed == "Browser"
| top 1 by CreatedDateTime
| project-away CreatedDateTime
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"] !contains "reportOnly" and ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"] !contains "notEnabled"
| project name = ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"]
| project Value = name, Label = strcat(name, ' - (Enabled)'), selected = true, displayOrder = "1", group = "Enabled policies"
| union (
SigninLogs
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, CreatedDateTime, ClientAppUsed
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ClientAppUsed == "Browser"
| top 1 by CreatedDateTime
| project-away CreatedDateTime
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"] contains "reportOnly"
| project name = ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"]
| project Value = name, Label = strcat(name, ' - (Report-only)'), selected = false, displayOrder = "2", group = "Report-only policies"
)
| sort by displayOrder asc, Label asc

parameters.name: unit
parameters.label: Data view
parameters.description: Display results by number of users or number of sign-ins

content.json:
## Impact Summary
Here is the impact of the selected policy in your tenant over the {TimeRange}. 

💡 _View summary by number of users or number of sign-ins. Click on a tile to view details below._

content.query:
// Total
SigninLogs
| where CreatedDateTime {TimeRange:value}
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where "{User:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{User:escape}"
| where "{App:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{App:escape}"
| project-away AppDisplayName
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"] == "{Policy:escape}"
| project-away ConditionalAccessPolicies
{unit} summarize count() by UserDisplayName
| summarize count()
| extend resultName = "Total", unit = case("{unit}" == "//", "sign-ins","users"), statusCode = 1
//
//
// Number of success/failure/user action required/not applied
| union (
SigninLogs
| where CreatedDateTime {TimeRange:value}
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where "{User:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{User:escape}"
| where "{App:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{App:escape}"
| project-away AppDisplayName
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"] == "{Policy:escape}"
| extend result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"]
| project-away ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend resultName = case(result == "success" or result == "reportOnlySuccess", "Success", result == "failure" or result == "reportOnlyFailure", "Failure", result == "interrupt" or result == "reportOnlyInterrupted", "User action required", "Not applied")
| extend statusCode = case(result == "success", 2, result == "failure", 3, result == "interrupt", 4, 5)
{unit} summarize count() by resultName, UserDisplayName, statusCode
| summarize count() by resultName, statusCode
| extend unit = case("{unit}" == "//", "sign-ins","users")
)
//
// Case if result count is 0
| join kind = fullouter (
    datatable (resultName:string,statusCode1:string)
    ["Total", 1,
     "Success", 2,
     "Failure", 3,
     "User action required", 4,
     "Not applied", 5]
) on resultName
| extend resultName = iff(resultName == '', resultName1, resultName), count_ = iff(resultName == '', 0, count_), unit = "{unit:label}", statusCode1
| project-away resultName1
| sort by statusCode1 asc

content.json:
__________________________________________
## Breakdown per condition and sign-in status
💡 _Click the LogAnalytics icon in the corner of each query to run in a new window._

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where CreatedDateTime{TimeRange:value}
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName, DeviceDetail
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where "{User:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{User:escape}"
| where "{App:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{App:escape}"
| project-away AppDisplayName
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"] == "{Policy:escape}"
| extend result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"]
| project-away ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend filterResult = case("{resultName}" == "Total","successfailureinterruptreportOnlySuccessreportOnlyFailurereportOnlyInterruptedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled", "{resultName}" == "Success", "successreportOnlySuccess", "{resultName}" == "Failure", "failurereportOnlyFailure", "{resultName}" == "User action required", "interruptreportOnlyInterrupted","notAppliedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled")
| where filterResult contains result
| extend deviceState = case(DeviceDetail["trustType"] == "", "Unmanaged", DeviceDetail["trustType"])
{unit} summarize count() by UserDisplayName, deviceState
| summarize count() by deviceState

SigninLogs
| where CreatedDateTime {TimeRange:value}
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName, DeviceDetail
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where "{User:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{User:escape}"
| where "{App:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{App:escape}"
| project-away AppDisplayName
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"] == "{Policy:escape}"
| extend result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"]
| project-away ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend filterResult = case("{resultName}" == "Total","successfailureinterruptreportOnlySuccessreportOnlyFailurereportOnlyInterruptedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled", "{resultName}" == "Success", "successreportOnlySuccess", "{resultName}" == "Failure", "failurereportOnlyFailure", "{resultName}" == "User action required", "interruptreportOnlyInterrupted","notAppliedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled")
| where filterResult contains result
| extend device = tostring(DeviceDetail["operatingSystem"])
{unit} summarize count() by UserDisplayName, device
| summarize count() by device

SigninLogs
| where CreatedDateTime {TimeRange:value}
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName, ClientAppUsed
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where "{User:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{User:escape}"

| extend filterResult = case("{resultName}" == "Total","successfailureinterruptreportOnlySuccessreportOnlyFailurereportOnlyInterruptedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled", "{resultName}" == "Success", "successreportOnlySuccess", "{resultName}" == "Failure", "failurereportOnlyFailure", "{resultName}" == "User action required", "interruptreportOnlyInterrupted","notAppliedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled")
| where filterResult contains result
{unit} summarize count() by UserDisplayName, ClientAppUsed
| summarize count() by ClientAppUsed

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where CreatedDateTime {TimeRange:value}
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where "{User:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{User:escape}"
| where "{App:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{App:escape}"
| project-away AppDisplayName
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"] == "{Policy:escape}"
| extend result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"]
| project-away ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend filterResult = case("{resultName}" == "Total","successfailureinterruptreportOnlySuccessreportOnlyFailurereportOnlyInterruptedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled", "{resultName}" == "Success", "successreportOnlySuccess", "{resultName}" == "Failure", "failurereportOnlyFailure", "{resultName}" == "User action required", "interruptreportOnlyInterrupted","notAppliedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled")
| where filterResult contains result
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName
| sort by Count desc
content.title: User sign-in count

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where CreatedDateTime {TimeRange:value}
| project ConditionalAccessPolicies, CreatedDateTime, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName, CorrelationId, Status
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where '{user:escape}' == '*' or '{user:escape}' == UserDisplayName
| where "{User:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{User:escape}"
| where "{App:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{App:escape}"
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"] == "{Policy:escape}"
| extend result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"], failureReason = tostring(Status["failureReason"])
| project-away ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend filterResult = case("{resultName}" == "Total","successfailureinterruptreportOnlySuccessreportOnlyFailurereportOnlyInterruptedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled", "{resultName}" == "Success", "successreportOnlySuccess", "{resultName}" == "Failure", "failurereportOnlyFailure", "{resultName}" == "User action required", "interruptreportOnlyInterrupted","notAppliedreportOnlyNotAppliednotEnabled")
| where filterResult contains result
| project CreatedDateTime, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName, result, CorrelationId
content.title: Sign-in events

content.json: Microsoft recommends blocking sign-ins from legacy authentication protocols.

links.postText: to learn more about blocking legacy authentication

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project ClientAppUsed, ResultType, ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName, TimeGenerated
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where "{Users:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{Users:escape}"
| where "{Apps:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{Apps:escape}"
| where ResultType == 0
| extend filterClientApp = case(ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients", "Legacy Authentication", "Modern Authentication")
| summarize count() by UserDisplayName, filterClientApp, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| summarize count() by filterClientApp, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Users Signed-in on Legacy vs. Modern Authentication

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project ClientAppUsed, ResultType, ConditionalAccessPolicies, UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName
| where "{Users:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{Users:escape}"
| where "{Apps:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{Apps:escape}"
| where ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients"
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by UserDisplayName, ClientAppUsed
| summarize Count = count() by ClientAppUsed
content.title: Legacy Authentication Client Apps Used

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project ClientAppUsed, AppDisplayName, ConditionalAccessPolicies, ResultType, UserDisplayName
| where ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients"
| where "{Users:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{Users:escape}"
| where "{Apps:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{Apps:escape}"
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName
| summarize Count = count() by AppDisplayName
content.title: Users Using Legacy Authentication by Application
content.noDataMessage: No applications allowing legacy authentication sign-ins for the selected time range

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project ClientAppUsed, AppDisplayName, ConditionalAccessPolicies, ResultType, UserDisplayName
| where "{Users:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{Users:escape}"
| where "{Apps:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{Apps:escape}"
| where ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients"
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by UserDisplayName, AppDisplayName, ClientAppUsed
| project-away count_
content.title: Select an application and user
content.noDataMessage: No application sign-ins using legacy authentication within this time frame

content.query:
SigninLogs
| project UserDisplayName, ClientAppUsed, AppDisplayName, ConditionalAccessPolicies, ResultType, TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, LocationDetails, DeviceDetail
| where ClientAppUsed != "Browser" and ClientAppUsed != "Mobile Apps and Desktop clients"
| where "{Users:escape}" == "All users" or UserDisplayName contains "{Users:escape}"
| where "{Apps:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName contains "{Apps:escape}"
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| where ResultType == 0
| where AppDisplayName == "{app}"
| where UserDisplayName == "{user}"
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId
content.title: {user} legacy authentication sign-ins to {app}

content.json:
## Guide to using this workbook

Identity Protection is a tool that allows organizations to accomplish three key tasks:

	1. Automate the detection and remediation of identity-based risks.
	2. Investigate risks using data in the portal.
	3. Export risk detection data to your SIEM.

Identity Protection uses the learnings Microsoft has acquired from their position in organizations with Azure AD, the consumer space with Microsoft Accounts, and in gaming with Xbox to protect your users. Microsoft analyses 6.5 trillion signals per day to identify and protect customers from threats.

The signals generated by and fed to Identity Protection, can be further fed into tools like Conditional Access to make access decisions, or fed back to a security information and event management (SIEM) tool for further investigation based on your organization's enforced policies.... [Learn more](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/identity-protection/overview-identity-protection).


### Workbook parameters 
	• Time range: Select how long back the report will load. Longer time ranges may not load for large tenants

	• Workspace: Select the Log Analytics workspace you want to use.

Map location is based on longitude and latiude data. Size of the circles are based on number of risk detections. Color of circles are based on the Weighted Risk = Number of Detections x Weight

Weight: High Risk = 10, Medium Risk = 5, Low Risk = 1

Lower risk circles are yellow and higher risk circles are red.

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
| where UserDisplayName != ""
| extend ParseLocation = parse_json(Location)
| extend City = iff(ParseLocation.city == '', 'Unknown', tostring(ParseLocation.city))
| extend State = iff(ParseLocation.state == '', 'Unknown', tostring(ParseLocation.state))
| extend GeoCoord = ParseLocation.geoCoordinates
| extend ParseGeoCoord = parse_json(GeoCoord)
| extend Latitude = ParseGeoCoord.latitude
| extend Longitude = ParseGeoCoord.longitude
| extend LowRiskWeight = iff(RiskLevel == "low", 1, 0)
| extend MedRiskWeight = iff(RiskLevel == "medium", 5, 0)
| extend HighRiskWeight = iff(RiskLevel == "high", 10, 0)
| extend TotalRiskWeight = LowRiskWeight + MedRiskWeight + HighRiskWeight
| project UserDisplayName,RiskLevel, Location, Latitude, Longitude, City, State, TotalRiskWeight
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName, tostring(Latitude), tostring(Longitude), City, State, TotalRiskWeight
//| summarize LocationCount = count() by tostring(Latitude)
| sort by Count desc

content.json: Real-Time detections may not show up in reporting for five to ten minutes. Offline detections may not show up in reporting for two to twenty-four hours.

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
//|summarize RiskEvents = count () by bin (TimeGenerated, 1h)
|where IpAddress != ''
| summarize count() by bin (TimeGenerated, 1h), DetectionTimingType
content.title: Hourly Risk Detections - Offline vs. Real Time

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
//|summarize RiskEvents = count () by bin (TimeGenerated, 1h)
|where IpAddress != ''
| summarize count() by bin (TimeGenerated, 1h), DetectionTimingType
content.title: Total Count - Offline vs. Real Time

content.json: The offline risk events are those that cannot be remediated via a sign in risk policy, and are important for admins to investigate/turn on risky users policy to remediate

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
|where IpAddress != ''
| extend riskLevel = case(RiskLevel == "", "none", RiskLevel)
| where DetectionTimingType in ({DetectionTimingType}) or '*' in ({DetectionTimingType})
| where RiskLevel in ({riskLevel}) or '*' in ({riskLevel})
| summarize count() by bin (TimeGenerated, 1h), riskLevel
content.title: Hourly Risk Detections by Level

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
|where IpAddress != ''
| extend riskLevel = case(RiskLevel == "", "none", RiskLevel)
| where DetectionTimingType in ({DetectionTimingType}) or '*' in ({DetectionTimingType})
| where RiskLevel in ({riskLevel}) or '*' in ({riskLevel})
| summarize count() by bin (TimeGenerated, 1h), riskLevel
|sort by riskLevel desc
content.title: Total Count by Risk Level

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
|where IpAddress != ''
| extend riskLevel = case(RiskLevel == "", "none", RiskLevel)
| where DetectionTimingType in ({DetectionTimingType}) or '*' in ({DetectionTimingType})
| where RiskLevel in ({riskLevel}) or '*' in ({riskLevel})
|summarize RiskEvents = count () by bin (TimeGenerated, 1h), RiskEventType
content.title: Hourly Risk Detections Event Type

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
|where IpAddress != ''
| extend riskLevel = case(RiskLevel == "", "none", RiskLevel)
| where DetectionTimingType in ({DetectionTimingType}) or '*' in ({DetectionTimingType})
| where RiskLevel in ({riskLevel}) or '*' in ({riskLevel})
|project RiskEventType, UserDisplayName
|extend riskEvent = case(RiskEventType == "", "blank", RiskEventType)
|summarize count() by riskEvent
|sort by riskEvent desc
content.title: Total Count by Risk Event Type

content.json: Risk Event Types can include new country, unfamiliar events, anonymized IP Address, admin confirmed user compromise, password spray or risky IP Address.

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
|where IpAddress != ''
| extend riskLevel = case(RiskLevel == "", "none", RiskLevel)
| where DetectionTimingType in ({DetectionTimingType}) or '*' in ({DetectionTimingType})
| where RiskLevel in ({riskLevel}) or '*' in ({riskLevel})
| summarize TotalCount= count(), HighRiskCount = countif(riskLevel == "high"), MediumRiskCount = countif(riskLevel == "medium"), LowRiskCount = countif(riskLevel == "low"), NoRiskCount = countif(riskLevel=="none") by UserDisplayName
| sort by HighRiskCount, MediumRiskCount, LowRiskCount desc
content.title: Count of Risk Detections by User

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
|where IpAddress != ''
| extend riskLevel = case(RiskLevel == "", "none", RiskLevel)
| where DetectionTimingType in ({DetectionTimingType}) or '*' in ({DetectionTimingType})
| where RiskLevel in ({riskLevel}) or '*' in ({riskLevel})
| summarize TotalCount= count(), HighRiskCount = countif(riskLevel == "high"), MediumRiskCount = countif(riskLevel == "medium"), LowRiskCount = countif(riskLevel == "low"), NoRiskCount = countif(riskLevel == "none") by IpAddress
|sort by HighRiskCount, MediumRiskCount, LowRiskCount desc
content.title: Risk Detections by IP Address

content.json:
# Risky Users
A user risk represents the probability that a given identity or account is compromised.

These risks are calculated offline using Microsoft's internal and external threat intelligence sources including security researchers, law enforcement professionals, security teams at Microsoft, and other trusted sources.
To reduce the number of risky users with no action taken on them, [enable user risk policies for automatic remediation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2171421)

content.query:
AADRiskyUsers
| where RiskDetail in ({RiskDetail}) or '*' in ({RiskDetail})
| where RiskLevel in ({RiskLevel}) or '*' in ({RiskLevel})
 |summarize count(RiskLevel) by bin(TimeGenerated,1d), RiskLevel
content.title: Daily Count of Users by Risk Level

content.query:
AADRiskyUsers
| where RiskDetail in ({RiskDetail}) or '*' in ({RiskDetail})
| where RiskLevel in ({RiskLevel}) or '*' in ({RiskLevel})
| summarize count() by RiskDetail
content.title: Action taken on Risky Users
High Risk Users by Time Generated
Users with changes in Risk Level

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
//| summarize buildschema(Location)
| where IpAddress != ''
| extend ParseLocation = parse_json(Location)
| extend CountryOrRegion = iff(ParseLocation.countryOrRegion == '', 'Unknown', tostring(ParseLocation.countryOrRegion))
| extend GeoCoord = ParseLocation.geoCoordinates
| extend ParseGeoCoord = parse_json(GeoCoord)
| extend Latitude = ParseGeoCoord.latitude
| extend Longitude = ParseGeoCoord.longitude
| extend LowRiskWeight = iff(RiskLevel == "low", 1, 0)
| extend MedRiskWeight = iff(RiskLevel == "medium", 5, 0)
| extend HighRiskWeight = iff(RiskLevel == "high", 10, 0)
| extend TotalRiskWeight = LowRiskWeight + MedRiskWeight + HighRiskWeight
| project UserDisplayName,RiskLevel, Location, Latitude, Longitude, CountryOrRegion, RiskEventType, IpAddress, DetectionTimingType, TotalRiskWeight
| summarize by UserDisplayName, CountryOrRegion, tostring(Latitude), tostring(Longitude), IpAddress, RiskLevel, RiskEventType, DetectionTimingType, TotalRiskWeight
//| summarize LocationCount = count() by tostring(Latitude)
| sort by TotalRiskWeight
content.title: Summary of Risk Detections by Risk Level

content.query:
AADRiskyUsers
| project UserDisplayName, RiskLevel, RiskDetail, RiskState, CorrelationId, TenantId
| order by RiskLevel
content.title: Summary of Risky Users by Risk Level

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| where "{App:escape}" == "All apps" or AppDisplayName has "{App:escape}"
| where "{FactorsRequired}" has AuthenticationRequirement
| project AuthenticationRequirement, TimeGenerated
| summarize count() by AuthenticationRequirement, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)

parameters.name: Methods
parameters.jsonData:
[
    {"value": "Password", "label": "Password"},
    {"value": "Text message", "label": "Text message"},
    {"value": "Mobile app notification", "label": "Mobile app notification"},
    {"value": "Mobile app verification code", "label": "Mobile app verification code"},
    {"value": "Phone call (Authentication phone)", "label": "Phone call"},
    {"value": "Passwordless phone sign-in", "label": "Passwordless phone sign-in"},
    {"value": "WindowsHelloForBusiness", "label": "Windows Hello for Business"},
    {"value": "TemporaryAccessPass", "label": "Temporary Access Pass"},
    {"value": "Sms", "label": "SMS Sign-in"},
    {"value": "OATH hardware token", "label": "OATH hardware token"},
    {"value": "fido", "label": "FIDO token"}
]

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| project AuthenticationDetails
| where AuthenticationDetails has "authenticationMethod"
| extend AuthenticationDetails = parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)
| mv-expand AuthenticationDetails
| where isnotempty(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod)
| project method = case(tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod) == "PHS", "Password", tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod) == "PHS, StagedRollout", "Password", tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod) == "CloudOnlyPassword", "Password", tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod) == "PTA", "Password", tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod))
| where "{Methods}" has method
| summarize count() by method

content.json: ## Number of password resets and account unlocks

parameters.name: Activity
parameters.query:
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where LoggedByService == "Self-service Password Management"
| summarize by OperationName

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where LoggedByService == "Self-service Password Management"
| where "{Activity}" has OperationName
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), OperationName

content.json: ## Failure rate by authentication method (last 30 days)

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, UserDisplayName, AuthenticationDetails, Status
| where AuthenticationDetails has "authenticationMethod"
| extend AuthenticationDetails = parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)
| mv-expand AuthenticationDetails
| where isnotempty(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod)
| project method = case(tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod) == "PHS", "Password", tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod) == "PHS, StagedRollout", "Password", tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod) == "CloudOnlyPassword", "Password", tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod) == "PTA", "Password", tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod)), succeeded = AuthenticationDetails.succeeded
| summarize success = countif(succeeded == true), failure = countif(succeeded == false) by method
| project method, failureRate = (failure * 1.0) / ((failure + success) * 1.0)
| sort by failureRate desc

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.label: User Name
parameters.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
// user name 
| extend initby = parse_json(InitiatedBy) | extend userinfo1 = initby.user | extend userinfo2 = parse_json(userinfo1) 
| extend username = userinfo2.userPrincipalName
// app name 
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend appname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| extend mp = tr.modifiedProperties | mvexpand mp
| extend actinfo = mp.displayName
// consent and scope information 
| extend value1 = parse_json(mp) | extend val1 = value1.newValue
| where actinfo == "ConsentAction.Permissions"
| parse val1 with * "ResourceId:" Resourceid1 ", ConsentType: " ConsentType ", Scope:" Scope "]" * 
| extend Scope1 = split(Scope, " ")
| mvexpand Scope1 
| where Scope1 != ""
| project OperationName , username, appname, actinfo, Resourceid1, ConsentType, Scope1, CorrelationId 
| project username = tostring(username) 
| distinct username
| sort by username

parameters.name: AppName1
parameters.label: App Name
parameters.query:
(SigninLogs
| extend corrIDTime = strcat(CorrelationId, TimeGenerated)
| extend ConditionalAccessPolicies = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies)
| extend DeviceDetail = tostring(DeviceDetail) 
| extend LocationDetails = tostring(LocationDetails) 
| extend Status = tostring(Status)
| distinct AppDisplayName)
| union 

(AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
// user name 
| extend initby = parse_json(InitiatedBy) | extend userinfo1 = initby.user | extend userinfo2 = parse_json(userinfo1) 
| extend username = userinfo2.userPrincipalName
// app name 
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend appname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| extend mp = tr.modifiedProperties | mvexpand mp
| extend actinfo = mp.displayName
// consent and scope information 
| extend value1 = parse_json(mp) | extend val1 = value1.newValue
| where actinfo == "ConsentAction.Permissions"
| parse val1 with * "ResourceId:" Resourceid1 ", ConsentType: " ConsentType ", Scope:" Scope "]" * 
| extend Scope1 = split(Scope, " ")
| mvexpand Scope1 
| where Scope1 != ""
| project AppDisplayName = appname
| distinct AppDisplayName)
| distinct AppDisplayName

parameters.name: ScopeName1
parameters.label: Scope Name
parameters.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
// user name 
| extend initby = parse_json(InitiatedBy) | extend userinfo1 = initby.user | extend userinfo2 = parse_json(userinfo1) 
| extend username = userinfo2.userPrincipalName
// app name 
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend appname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| extend mp = tr.modifiedProperties | mvexpand mp
| extend actinfo = mp.displayName
// consent and scope information 
| extend value1 = parse_json(mp) | extend val1 = value1.newValue
| where actinfo == "ConsentAction.Permissions"
| parse val1 with * "ResourceId:" Resourceid1 ", ConsentType: " ConsentType ", Scope:" Scope "]" * 
| extend Scope1 = split(Scope, " ")
| mvexpand Scope1 
| where Scope1 != ""
| project Scope = tostring(Scope1)
| distinct Scope

parameters.name: API_Name1
parameters.label: API Name
parameters.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
// user name 
| extend initby = parse_json(InitiatedBy) | extend userinfo1 = initby.user | extend userinfo2 = parse_json(userinfo1) 
| extend username = userinfo2.userPrincipalName
// app name 
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend appname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| extend mp = tr.modifiedProperties | mvexpand mp
| extend actinfo = mp.displayName
// consent and scope information 
| extend value1 = parse_json(mp) | extend val1 = value1.newValue
| where actinfo == "ConsentAction.Permissions"
| parse val1 with * "ResourceId:" Resourceid1 ", ConsentType: " ConsentType ", Scope:" Scope "]" * 
| extend Scope1 = split(Scope, " ")
| mvexpand Scope1 
| where Scope1 != ""
//| project OperationName , username, appname, actinfo, Resourceid1, ConsentType, Scope1, CorrelationId 
| join kind = leftouter 
(
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "oAuth2"
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend apiname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| where apiname != ""
| project OperationName , apiname , CorrelationId
)
on $left.CorrelationId == $right.CorrelationId
|distinct apiname
| where apiname !=""
| sort by apiname

parameters.name: Consent_Type1
parameters.label: Consent Type
parameters.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
// user name 
| extend initby = parse_json(InitiatedBy) | extend userinfo1 = initby.user | extend userinfo2 = parse_json(userinfo1) 
| extend username = userinfo2.userPrincipalName
// app name 
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend appname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| extend mp = tr.modifiedProperties | mvexpand mp
| extend actinfo = mp.displayName
// consent and scope information 
| extend value1 = parse_json(mp) | extend val1 = value1.newValue
| where actinfo == "ConsentAction.Permissions"
| parse val1 with * "ResourceId:" Resourceid1 ", ConsentType: " ConsentType ", Scope:" Scope "]" * 
| project ConsentType 
//| where ConsentType != ""
|distinct ConsentType

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
// user name 
| extend initby = parse_json(InitiatedBy) | extend userinfo1 = initby.user | extend userinfo2 = parse_json(userinfo1) 
| extend username = userinfo2.userPrincipalName
// app name 
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend appname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| extend mp = tr.modifiedProperties | mvexpand mp
| extend actinfo = mp.displayName
// consent and scope information 
| extend value1 = parse_json(mp) | extend val1 = value1.newValue
| where actinfo == "ConsentAction.Permissions"
| parse val1 with * "ResourceId:" Resourceid1 ", ConsentType: " ConsentType ", Scope:" Scope "]" * 
| extend Scope1 = split(Scope, " ")
| mvexpand Scope1 
| where Scope1 != ""
| project OperationName , username, appname, actinfo, Resourceid1, ConsentType, Scope1, CorrelationId
| where username in ({UserName}) or '*' in  ({UserName})
| where ConsentType in ({Consent_Type1}) or '*' in ({Consent_Type1})
| where appname in ({AppName1}) or '*' in ({AppName1})
| where Scope1 in ({ScopeName1}) or '*' in ({ScopeName1})
| join kind = leftouter 
(
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "oAuth2"
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend apiname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| where apiname != ""
| project OperationName , apiname , CorrelationId
| where apiname in ({API_Name1}) or '*' in ({API_Name1})
)
on $left.CorrelationId == $right.CorrelationId
| join kind = leftouter
(
SigninLogs
| summarize distinctUserSignInCount=dcount(UserId), signInCount=count() by AppDisplayName 
) 
on $left.appname == $right.AppDisplayName
//| extend api_scope = strcat(apiname, " - ", Scope1) 
| extend Scope = tostring(Scope1)
//| distinct Scope, appname, distinctUserSignInCount, signInCount, ConsentType 
| summarize Appcount=dcount(appname) by Scope
| sort by Appcount desc
content.title: Scope by Unique App Consent Requests

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
// user name 
| extend initby = parse_json(InitiatedBy) | extend userinfo1 = initby.user | extend userinfo2 = parse_json(userinfo1) 
| extend username = userinfo2.userPrincipalName
// app name 
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend appname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| extend mp = tr.modifiedProperties | mvexpand mp
| extend actinfo = mp.displayName
// consent and scope information 
| extend value1 = parse_json(mp) | extend val1 = value1.newValue
| where actinfo == "ConsentAction.Permissions"
| parse val1 with * "ResourceId:" Resourceid1 ", ConsentType: " ConsentType ", Scope:" Scope "]" * 
| extend Scope1 = split(Scope, " ")
| mvexpand Scope1 
| where Scope1 != ""
| project OperationName , username, appname, actinfo, Resourceid1, ConsentType, Scope1, CorrelationId 
| where username in ({UserName}) or '*' in  ({UserName})
| where ConsentType in ({Consent_Type1}) or '*' in ({Consent_Type1})
| where appname in ({AppName1}) or '*' in ({AppName1})
| where Scope1 in ({ScopeName1}) or '*' in ({ScopeName1})
| join kind = leftouter 
(
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "oAuth2"
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend apiname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| where apiname != ""
| project OperationName , apiname , CorrelationId
| where apiname in ({API_Name1}) or '*' in ({API_Name1})
)
on $left.CorrelationId == $right.CorrelationId
| join kind = leftouter
(
SigninLogs
| summarize distinctUserSignInCount=dcount(UserId), signInCount=count() by AppDisplayName 
) 
on $left.appname == $right.AppDisplayName
| extend api_scope = tostring(Scope1), API = tostring(apiname) 
| distinct  appname, distinctUserSignInCount
content.title: Applications by Unique User Sign Ins

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
// user name 
| extend initby = parse_json(InitiatedBy) | extend userinfo1 = initby.user | extend userinfo2 = parse_json(userinfo1) 
| extend username = userinfo2.userPrincipalName
// app name 
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend appname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| extend mp = tr.modifiedProperties | mvexpand mp
| extend actinfo = mp.displayName
// consent and scope information 
| extend value1 = parse_json(mp) | extend val1 = value1.newValue
| where actinfo == "ConsentAction.Permissions"
| parse val1 with * "ResourceId:" Resourceid1 ", ConsentType: " ConsentType ", Scope:" Scope "]" * 
| extend Scope1 = split(Scope, " ")
| mvexpand Scope1 
| where Scope1 != ""
| project OperationName , username, appname, actinfo, Resourceid1, ConsentType, Scope1, CorrelationId 
| where username in ({UserName}) or '*' in  ({UserName})
| where ConsentType in ({Consent_Type1}) or '*' in ({Consent_Type1})
| where appname in ({AppName1}) or '*' in ({AppName1})
| where Scope1 in ({ScopeName1}) or '*' in ({ScopeName1})
| join kind = leftouter 
(
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "oAuth2"
| extend tr = parse_json(TargetResources) | mvexpand tr | extend apiname = tostring(tr.displayName)
| where apiname != ""
| project OperationName , apiname , CorrelationId
| where apiname in ({API_Name1}) or '*' in ({API_Name1})
)
on $left.CorrelationId == $right.CorrelationId
|project UserName = tostring(username),  AppName = appname, ConsentType,  Scope = tostring(Scope1), API = apiname
|distinct UserName, AppName, ConsentType, Scope, API
content.title: Users by Application, API, Scope, Sign In Counts

parameters.name: UserDisplayName
parameters.label: User Display Name
parameters.query:
let SinginConsentTimes = SigninLogs
| join kind = leftouter
(
SigninLogs
|extend errorCode = Status.errorCode
|where errorCode == 90094 
|distinct CorrelationId 
)
on $left.CorrelationId == $right.CorrelationId
| summarize maxTime = max(TimeGenerated) by CorrelationId, UserId
| extend corrIDMaxTime = strcat(CorrelationId, maxTime)
| project corrIDMaxTime;
union
SigninLogs
| extend corrIDTime = strcat(CorrelationId, TimeGenerated)
| where corrIDTime in (SinginConsentTimes)
| extend ConditionalAccessPolicies = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies)
| extend DeviceDetail = tostring(DeviceDetail) 
| extend LocationDetails = tostring(LocationDetails) 
| extend Status = tostring(Status)
| distinct UserDisplayName
| sort by UserDisplayName

content.query:
let SinginConsentTimes = SigninLogs
| join kind = inner
(
SigninLogs
|extend errorCode = Status.errorCode
|where errorCode == 90094 
|distinct CorrelationId 
)
on $left.CorrelationId == $right.CorrelationId
| summarize maxTime = max(TimeGenerated) by CorrelationId, UserId
| extend corrIDMaxTime = strcat(CorrelationId, maxTime)
| project corrIDMaxTime;
SigninLogs
| extend corrIDTime = strcat(CorrelationId, TimeGenerated)
| where corrIDTime in (SinginConsentTimes)
| project AppDisplayName, UserId, CorrelationId, ResultType, UserDisplayName
| where AppDisplayName in ({AppName1}) or '*' in ({AppName1})
| where UserDisplayName in ({UserDisplayName}) or '*' in ({UserDisplayName})
//| summarize cnt = count() by ResultType
//| extend SigninStatus = case(ResultType == 0, "Success", "Failure")
//| summarize cnt = count() by AppDisplayName, SigninStatus
| summarize TotalFlows = count(), TotalUsers = dcount(UserId) by AppDisplayName
content.title: Count of access attempts where user needs admin consent for access
content.noDataMessage: There were no access attempts in the time range
